trackTitle: C Language from Basic to Pro
description: A complete C language learning path from absolute beginner to professional level, designed for classroom and self-paced learners. Includes exercises, mini-projects, assessments, and real-world applications.

segments.title: Segment 1 - Core Foundations (Beginner)
segments.summary: Start from zero and build a strong foundation in C programming, syntax, variables, data types, input/output and basic logic building.
